pageTitle: Business Achievement Awards - London Chamber of Commerce (London, Ontario)
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {14764=* The Awards were first divided into the small and large business categories in 1990. For our other award categories, please click on the attachments below., 1633=Once again, the London Business Achievement Awards gala lived up to its reputation of being the largest gala of its kind in Canada - and once again London's business community delivered - sending twenty outstanding finalists to the event that drew 1100 attendees., 2911=Established in 1982 to acknowledge and celebrate local achievement, the Business Achievement Awards have become London's most prestigious business event of the year. Designed to publically recognize London businesses that exemplify excellence, to be a finalist for an award is in itself a great accomplishment.}
textBeforeTable: Business of the Year Hall of Fame Innovation Award Excellence in Human Resources Award Environmental Leadership Award Corporate Social Responsibility Award Business of the Year, Small, Medium & Large 2007 - EllisDon 2008 - Trudell Medical Ltd. 2009 - Labatt Breweries of Canada 2010 - Sifton Properties 2011 - General Dynamics Land Systems Canada 2012 - London Life - Great West Life 2013 - 3M Canada 2014 - TD Canada Trust Past Winners: The London Chamber of Commerce is pleased to announce that GoodLife Fitness has been selected to be the Corporate Icon Award Recipient for 2015! Click Here to find out more. Corporate Icon Award Innovation Award: InMedic, Robarts Clinical Trials Inc. Excellence in Human Resources Award: Campbell Brothers Movers Ltd., CarProof, The London Club, Voices.com Environmental Leadership Award: Habitat for Humanity Heartland Ontario, Tepperman's Corporate Social Responsibility Award: Clintar Landscaping Management, Echidna Corp. o/a Digital Echidna, Simalam Inc. Business of the Year: AA Advantage Doors, adHOME Creative Inc., Akira Systems Inc., Arcane Digital, Armour Shield Roofing, Autodata Solutions Company, Back'n Motion, Bath Fitter, Big Viking Games, Brick House Productions, Cellular Magician, Centennial Windows & Doors, Classic Granite & Marble Ltd., CLC Tree Services Ltd., Delta London Armouries Hotel, Employee Wellness Solutions Network, EyeLook Media, Facility Resources Inc., Forked River Brewery Company, Gordons Gold
